laporan_dana_kampanye.name: Campaign Finance Report API
laporan_dana_kampanye.desc: The Campaign Finance Report API is a service that provides information about campaign finance reports in the 2014 Indonesian elections.

faq_presiden.name: FAQ Presiden API
faq_presiden.desc: The FAQ Presiden API is a service that provides answers to questions about rules and regulations affecting the 2014 Indonesian Presidential elections.

calon_presiden.name: Presidential Candidate API
calon_presiden.desc: The Presidential Candidate API is a service that provides information about candidates running for president and vice-president in the 2014 Indonesian elections.

laporan_pelanggaran.name: Laporan Pelanggaran API
laporan_pelanggaran.desc: The Laporan Pelanggaran API is a service that provides election violation reports.

socmedpemilu.name: Social Analytics API
socmedpemilu.desc: Social Analytics API is a service that provides social media information from president candidates in the 2014 Indonesian President Elections.

stamps.name: Stamps API
stamps.desc: The Stamps API is a service that provides links to election-related stamps and banners that can be overlaid on photographs.

candidate.name: Candidate API
candidate.desc: The Candidate API is a service that provides information about candidates running for office in the 2014 Indonesian elections.

pertanyaan.name: Pertanyaan API v1
pertanyaan.desc: The Question API is a service that provides information about rules and regulations API in the 2014 Indonesian elections.

geographic.name: Geographic API v1
geographic.desc: The Geographic API is a service that provides information about geographic boundaries relevant to Indonesian elections and civic government.

pendidikan.name: Pendidikan API v1
pendidikan.desc: The Pendidikan API is a service that provides information about the Indonesian elections.
